title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.36 - Advance Traffic Control Signs (W3-1, W3-2, W3-3, W3-4)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.36 - Advance Traffic Control Signs (W3-1, W3-2, W3-3, W3-4)

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraphs: Guidance: 01A Both the need for, and the placement of, the Signal

Ahead sign should be based on the distances in Table 4D-2. 01B Both the need for, and the placement of, the Stop Ahead
and Yield Ahead signs should be based on the distances in Table
NY2C-4. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2C.36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
